channel.title: Vosk on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Vosk on Arrans github.io

item.title: alphacep/vosk-api
item.description: Offline speech recognition API for Android, iOS, Raspberry Pi and servers with Python, Java, C# and Node

item.title: campwill/hal-voice-assistant
item.description: A voice-activated AI assistant modeled after HAL 9000, built with Raspberry Pi and self-hosted services for speech-to-text, language generation, and text-to-speech.

item.title: PhilippeRo/IBus-Speech-To-Text
item.description: A speech to text IBus engine using VOSK
